landing.heroDescription: Manage your personal or shared expenses effortlessly. Upload receipts, categorize spending, and visualize where your money goes - all in one beautiful app.
landing.aiReceiptDescription: Upload receipts and let AI extract the details automatically
landing.visualAnalyticsDescription: Interactive charts and filters to understand your spending
landing.sharedAccountsDescription: Track expenses together with your partner or team
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage expenses
landing.featuresSubtitle: Built with modern tools for the best experience
landing.multipleAccountsDescription: Create separate accounts for personal, household, or work expenses. Keep your finances organized.
landing.categoriesTagsDescription: Organize expenses with custom categories and tags like vacation, work, or home.
landing.multiCurrencyDescription: Track expenses in any currency with automatic conversion to your preferred currency.
landing.darkModeDescription: Easy on the eyes with full dark mode support. Switch anytime.
landing.securePrivateDescription: Your data is encrypted and protected. No password needed - just a secure magic link.
landing.mobileFriendlyDescription: Access your expenses from any device. Works beautifully on desktop and mobile.

metadata.appDescription: Track and manage your expenses with ease. Simple, beautiful expense tracking for individuals and teams.
metadata.signInDescription: Sign in to your Gold-Finger account
metadata.verifyDescription: Verify your email to sign in

legal.privacyIntroText: Gold-Finger ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our expense tracking application.
legal.dataControllerText: Gold-Finger is the data controller for the personal data processed through this application. We are committed to processing your data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
legal.dataCollectedIntro: We collect the following types of data to provide our service:
legal.dataEmailDesc: Used for authentication via magic link (OTP). We do not use passwords.
legal.dataFinancialDesc: Expense and income records you create, including amounts, dates, descriptions, and categories.
legal.dataReceiptsDesc: Photos of receipts you upload for AI-powered data extraction.
legal.dataPreferencesDesc: Settings like preferred currency, theme, and language.
legal.legalBasisText: We process your personal data under the following legal bases:
legal.basisConsentDesc: You provide consent when creating an account and using our services.
legal.basisContractDesc: Processing is necessary to provide the expense tracking service you requested.
legal.basisLegitimateDesc: To improve our service and ensure security.
legal.thirdPartyIntro: We use the following third-party services to provide our application:
legal.thirdPartySupabase: Provides authentication, database storage, and file storage. Your data is stored securely in their infrastructure.
legal.thirdPartyGemini: Analyzes receipt images to extract expense details. Receipt images are sent to Google for processing.
legal.dataRetentionText: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. When you delete your account, we will delete your personal data within 30 days, except where we are required by law to retain it longer.
legal.yourRightsIntro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
legal.rightAccessDesc: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
legal.rightRectificationDesc: Request correction of inaccurate personal data.
legal.rightErasureDesc: Request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten").
legal.rightPortabilityDesc: Request your data in a machine-readable format.
legal.rightObjectionDesc: Object to processing of your personal data for certain purposes.
legal.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, including encryption in transit and at rest, secure authentication, and row-level security policies in our database.
legal.cookiesText: We use only essential cookies required for authentication and session management. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
legal.contactText: For privacy inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact us through the application settings.
legal.termsIntroText: By accessing or using Gold-Finger, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.
legal.serviceDescText: Gold-Finger is a personal expense and income tracking application. The service allows you to record financial transactions, upload receipts for automatic data extraction, and visualize your spending patterns.
legal.accountText: To use the service, you must create an account using a valid email address. You agree to:
legal.accountEmailAccurate: Provide an accurate email address that you have access to
legal.accountSecure: Keep your account secure and not share access with unauthorized users
legal.accountResponsible: Be responsible for all activity that occurs under your account
legal.acceptableUseText: You agree not to use the service to:
legal.useNoIllegal: Engage in any illegal activity or violate any applicable laws
legal.useNoHarm: Upload harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
legal.useNoAbuse: Attempt to abuse, overload, or disrupt the service
legal.useNoReverse: Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code from the application
legal.financialDisclaimerText: Gold-Finger is a tracking and organizational tool only. We do not provide financial advice, tax advice, or any professional financial services. The information displayed in the application should not be relied upon for making financial decisions. Always consult qualified professionals for financial advice.
legal.intellectualPropertyText: The Gold-Finger application, including its design, features, and content (excluding user data), is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any part of the application without permission.
legal.userContentText: You retain ownership of all data you enter into the application, including expense records, income records, and receipt images. By using the service, you grant us a limited license to store and process this data solely to provide the service to you.
legal.limitationText: Gold-Finger is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service, including any loss of data or financial losses.
legal.serviceAvailabilityText: We strive to maintain service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. The service may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, updates, or circumstances beyond our control. As a free service, we reserve the right to modify or discontinue features at any time.
legal.terminationText: You may terminate your account at any time by deleting it through the application settings. We may suspend or terminate your access if you violate these terms or engage in activity that harms the service or other users.
legal.changesText: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through the application. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
legal.governingLawText: These terms shall be governed by the laws of the European Union and the member state where the service operator is established, without regard to conflict of law principles.
legal.termsContactText: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the application settings.

recurring.title: Recurring Transactions
recurring.subtitle: Manage your recurring expenses and income
recurring.deleteRecurringExpenseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this recurring expense? This will not delete already generated expenses.
recurring.deleteRecurringIncomeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this recurring income? This will not delete already generated income.
recurring.noAccountsYet: You don't have any accounts yet.
recurring.pastOccurrencesWarning: {count, plural, one {# transaction} other {# transactions}} will be generated for past dates
recurring.pastOccurrencesInfo: Since the start date is in the past, transactions will be created immediately for all past occurrences up to today.
